snippet: The London Bullion Market Association will take on intellectual property rights for gold, platinum and palladium price benchmarks when they are launched by new administrators, the industry body said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: LBMA Takes Stake in Gold, Platinum, Palladium Benchmarks
headline.main: LBMA Takes Stake in Gold, Platinum, Palladium Benchmarks

lead_paragraph: The London Bullion Market Association will take on intellectual property rights for gold, platinum and palladium price benchmarks when they are launched by new administrators, the industry body said on Friday.
